config.AlwaysSkipPet.name: Always Skip Pet Adoption Event
config.AlwaysSkipPet.description: Turn this ON if you need to always skip Marnie's pet event. Turn this OFF after event is skipped by this mod will let the event trigger again.
config.AlwaysSkipFarmCave.name: Always Skip Farm Cave Event
config.AlwaysSkipFarmCave.description: Turn this ON if you need to always skip Demetrius's farm cave event. Turn this OFF after event is skipped by this mod will let the event trigger again.
